summary: A brave unicorn (Mia Farrow) and a magician (Alan Arkin) fight an evil King (Sir Christopher Lee), who is obsessed with attempting to capture the world's unicorns.
cast: Alan Arkin|Jeff Bridges|Mia Farrow|Tammy Grimes|Robert Klein|Angela Lansbury|Christopher Lee|Keenan Wynn|Paul Frees|Rene Auberjonois|Theodore Gottlieb|Don Messick|Jack Lester|Nellie Bellflower|Ed Peck|Ken Jennings|America|Gerry Beckley|Dewey Bunnell|Will Leacox|Brad Palmer|Michael 'Woodzy' Woods
director: Directors: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jr.
